title: Goal-Oriented Prompt Optimizer

placeholders.name: prompt
placeholders.label: Existing prompt plus desired outcome or metric to improve

template: Transform {{prompt}} into a sharper, goal-aligned prompt with diagnostics, rationale, and validation guidance.
Assumption: Preserve the original intent while increasing clarity and determinism.
- Keep optimized prompt self-contained and contradiction-free.
1. Objective extraction — identify purpose, audience, constraints, success metrics; note ambiguities.
2. Diagnostic review — evaluate clarity, structure, SNR, missing context, conflicts, hallucination risk.
3. Optimization — rewrite for precision; order steps logically; add guardrails; remove redundancy.
4. Validation design — define tests with sample inputs, expected outputs, metrics, acceptance criteria.
5. Tuning levers — suggest variants or parameters for future experiments.
1. Diagnosis — bullets grouped by category (Clarity, Context, Structure, Safety/Compliance, Metrics).
2. Optimized Prompt — fenced block labelled OPTIMIZED_PROMPT with the refined prompt.
3. Rationale & Expected Impact — brief paragraph tying changes to goal/metric.
4. Validation Plan — bullets with measurable success criteria and cadence.
5. Tuning Ideas — optional list of further experiments or parameter tweaks.
- Core intent, constraints, and success metrics preserved.
- Changes justified by goal/metric; improve clarity/determinism.
- Validation plan specifies measurable outcomes and next steps.
Revise once if any Quality Check would fail.
